welcome_message_body: Welcome to Huntersville, where small-town charm meets vibrant community spirit. Known for its beautiful lakes, outdoor activities, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Welcome and enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves a variety of airlines including Delta, JetBlue, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D serves a variety of airlines including Frontier, Southwest, and Spirit.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E serves international flights and is connected to the main terminal via a walkway.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rowan County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rowan County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
